title: Not receiving chests
body:
I haven't been receiving chests for ARAM recently. Is something up? Last game had 3 people score an S

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2656604879/203397559

replies.body: Having someone else get an S doesn't 100% guarantee that you get a chest as well, it does mean you have the option of getting one based on if you've already earned one for that champion or not. Keep in mind, you can only get one mastery chest per champion per season.
I did not have mastery chests for quite a few of them.
